content: s a t u r n a t o q u e by jennifer emslie instagram uptown_yarns one size fits most gauge 17sts and 26rows = 10cm in texture pattern on 6mm needle you ll need 1 skein uptown yarns hand dyed chunky merino 5mm 40cm circular 6mm 40cm circular 6mm dpns wool needle with 5mm circular cast on 72sts place marker and join in round work 10 rnds in k1 p1 ribbing change to 6mm circular work in texture pattern as follows rnds 1 and 2 knit rnds 3 and 4 * k1 p1 repeat from * around rnds 5 and 6 knit rnds 7 and 8 * p1 k1 repeat from * around repeat rnds 1-8 two more times then work rnds 1 and 2 once more your hat at this point will be approximately 17 cm 6 5 from cast on crown decreasing change to 6mm dpns when necessary round 1 * k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k2tog repeat from * around round 2 * k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 repeat from * around round 3 * k5 k2tog repeat from * around round 4 knit around round 5 * p1 k1 p1 k1 k2tog repeat from * around round 6 * p1 k1 p1 k2 repeat from * around round 7 * k3 k2tog repeat from * around round 8 knit around round 9 * k1 p1 k2tog repeat from * around round 10 * k1 p1 k1 repeat from * around round 11 * k1 k2tog repeat from * around round 12 * k2tog repeat from * around draw yarn thru remaining sts secure tightly and weave in ends enjoy
